title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 588.15 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 588.15 - Exemptions

State Regulations

Providers of service shall be exempt from sections
588.5
(k)(4)
and
588.6
(b)-(d)
of
this Part as they relate to recipients who are currently enrolled in a managed
care organization which is certified or approved by the Commissioner of the New

York State Department of Health, and who are currently receiving services which
are covered by the benefit package of the managed care
organization. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
588.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
